channel.title: Anybody Still Play This Game for No Reason?
channel.description:
Anybody still play this game? Actually play...not
lame shit like skills or fighting or making money or whatever
more like trying to open your own store in an empty area of the game, dancing around fires, dropping stuff on the ground, setting up SCAR programs to wander around and debate politics, meeting chill people, fucking shit up...ETC....?
Story? Pic? Just wondering. I haven't played, in a while.

item.title: Anybody Still Play This Game for No Reason?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:14, topic:117607”]Maybe if I keep posting old pics somebody else will too.

[/quote]

Mine are mid 2003-4 at best. And there on my mums old pc, so kinda hard to get.

Read full topic

item.title: Anybody Still Play This Game for No Reason?
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

i had 27 rune short swords, and i dropped them all of varrock. funny

Also, I have been playing since 2003, and I have noticed alot of big changes… Most for the worst. I think they should release like 5 servers with the old game on it? that would be pretty fun for some old schoolers.

Read full topic

item.title: Anybody Still Play This Game for No Reason?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

[quote=“Tribal, post:2, topic:117607”]
I dont play runescape allot but here’s a pic of me and my friend showing off our discontinued items.

good times… :rolleyes:[/quote]

Fuck me, that’s an old pic…

Read full topic
item.source: Anybody Still Play This Game for No Reason?

item.title: Anybody Still Play This Game for No Reason?
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

yeah i played rsc with my account called ‘darkness1440’ something like that and me a my bro would have fun dueling people any were and we could get around much eaiser too. the update killed us, we asked how do i get to the big city. we could like only find lumbridge. instead, i wasted my gp on buying a fricken map. and i was done finding stuff but 1gp was alot to me back then.

Read full topic
item.source: Anybody Still Play This Game for No Reason?

item.title: Anybody Still Play This Game for No Reason?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Fr33sc4p3, post:3, topic:117607”][quote author=PaulT link=topic=166885.msg1552501#msg1552501 date=1183042773]
Anybody still play this game? Actually play…not

lame shit
like
skills or fighting or making money
or whatever

more like trying to open your own store in an empty area of the game, dancing around fires, dropping stuff on the ground, setting up SCAR programs to wander around and debate politics, meeting chill people, fucking shit up…ETC…?

Story? Pic?
Just wondering. I haven’t played, in a while.

[/quote]

I got bored of it and thought exactly the same as you, i didnt go on it for like a year, i started playing again a few weeks ago, its not that bad if you take regular breaks, as you come back to knew updates

And wow, Tribal, that picture is OLD![/quote]

I’m sure I have a pic on my mums pc with me and a blue mask, over 2 years ago.

On a side note, I don’t usually play at all, and when I do it’s just scar autoing up monies for CWars/Fun duels/lame pkin, but I’m an old rs gamer, I joined roughly a month after RS2 release so I go way back(before the white line around items when you click them, before pmods!) so that’s what keeps me playing, sure, back then, what did we have at best? Granite shield going not so far back? It was fun, no whips, no barrows, no lame updates after barrows(I seriously left it, I completed all my quests back then and now I have 192 QP, didn’t do any of the recent ones and there’s rougly 50+), but back then I used to do drop parties, chill with mates, wonder doing odd, ODD stuff. I have to agree with you, PaulT, that jagex are killing the game.

Some more recent holiday items:

Yoyo : sucked
Easter ring : sucked, but fun now
Zombie head : cool
Rubber chicken : not half bad, fun for 5 mins
The scarfs, hats and those odd toys : not bad at all with the varrock update

I didn’t bother with this years easter, too childish. Sorry for the odd off topicness, but I think this topic is more deeper than “do you fuck shit up?”.

Read full topic
item.source: Anybody Still Play This Game for No Reason?
